data.eml:eml: Larval development of the land hermit crab Coenobita violascens Heller, 1862 (Decapoda, Anomura, Coenobitidae) described from laboratory-reared material

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kato, Saori, Hamasaki, Katsuyuki, Dan, Shigeki, Kitada, Shuichi (2015): Larval development of the land hermit crab Coenobita violascens Heller, 1862 (Decapoda, Anomura, Coenobitidae) described from laboratory-reared material. Zootaxa 3915 (2): 233-249, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3915.2.3
